snippet: “Documerica” paired the music of the string quartet Ethel with evocative images from an Environmental Protection Agency project in the 1970s that documented America’s relationship to its land.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews multimedia concert presentation Documerica, performed by new-music string quartet Ethel and featuring evocative images from a 1970s Environmental Protection Agency photography project, at Brooklyn Academy of Music.
lead_paragraph: “Documerica” paired the music of the string quartet Ethel with evocative images from an Environmental Protection Agency project in the 1970s that documented America’s relationship to its land.

headline.seo: ‘Documerica,’ at BAM, Featuring the New-Music Quartet Ethel
headline.main: An Environmental Album Recaptured in a Concert
headline.print_headline: An Environmental Album Recaptured in a Concert
